author: mkewmankovr
title: Evacuation Notice Issued Due to Hazardous Situation With Oroville Dam Emergency Spillway
text: OROVILLE (CBS13) — Butte County Sheriff has issued an evacuation notice for the low levels of Oroville and areas downstream from the Oroville Dam. The emergency spillway is eroding which could lead to a failure of the structure sending an uncontrolled release of flood water from Lake Oroville Immediate evacuation from low levels of Oroville to Gridley. The Feather river will experience a rapid rise in water level affecting surrounding areas. Stay tuned to for more information as it becomes available.
